title: Kerry Lands In Badhdad, Bearing Warnings For Iraqi Leaders
teaser: Secretary of State John Kerry is touching on a number of complex foreign policy issues this week â€” from violence in Iraq, to political instability in Egypt and the conflict in Ukraine.NPR's Jackie Northam is on the trip and talks with All Things Considered.
